title: Apply & Get Vetted
text: Submit your credentials and portfolio. Our team reviews your qualifications to ensure alignment with our quality standards.

title: Partnership Agreement
text: Once approved, we formalize our partnership. Clear terms, fair compensation structure, and mutual commitment to excellence.

title: Project Matching
text: We connect you with projects that match your expertise and capacity. You choose which opportunities to pursue.

title: Execute & Grow
text: Focus on delivering exceptional work while we handle client management, payments, and finding your next project.
